info.title: ApplicationInsightsManagementClient
info.description: Azure Application Insights client for web test locations.

get.description: Gets a list of web test locations available to this Application Insights component.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.

200.description: A list containing 0 or more web test location names available to the Application Insights component.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the web test location.

ApplicationInsightsComponentWebTestLocat.description: Properties that define a web test location available to an Application Insights Component.

ApplicationInsightsWebTestLocationsListR.description: Describes the list of web test locations available to an Application Insights Component.

ResourceNameParameter.name: resourceName
ResourceNameParameter.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.
